Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui

Class GuiApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.GuiApplication
public class GuiApplication extends javafx.application.Application
The main JavaFX application class. Its methods are accessible through the instance obtainable as a parameter from afterInit(Consumer), which ensures that the code is executed in the javafx thread after all initialization has taken place.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Getter for the root element of the current Scene
      Returns:
      the root element of the current Scene

    • getSceneName

      public String getSceneName()
      Returns the name of the current Scene. If a scene has never switched, the name will be null.
      Returns:
      the name of the current Scene

    • getInstance

      public static GuiApplication getInstance()
      Returns the application instance. If the application has not finished initialization, this method will return null
      Returns:
      the application instance

    • switchScene

      public void switchScene(SceneBuilder builder)
      Switches the currently displayed root Parent to the one provided by the given SceneBuilder. If the loading fails, the error is logged and the operation aborted.
      Parameters:
      builder - the SceneBuilder
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if builder is null

    • switchSceneIfDifferent

      public void switchSceneIfDifferent(SceneBuilder builder)
      Switches the currently displayed root Parent to the one provided by the given SceneBuilder only if the current Scene and the one provided by the given builder have different names. If the loading fails, the error is logged and the operation aborted.
      Parameters:
      builder - the SceneBuilder
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if builder is null

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application

    • connectWindowCloseCallback

      public void connectWindowCloseCallback(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.stage.WindowEvent> handler)
      Sets the onCloseRequest stage callback to the given handler.
      Parameters:
      handler - the EventHandler

    • afterInit

      public static void afterInit(Consumer<GuiApplication> func)
      Runs the given runnable on the application thread after the application has finished initialization. The method will block until initialization in complete. If the thread the method has been called from is interrupted, the operation is discarded.
      Parameters:
      func - the Runnable to run
      See Also:
      • Platform.runLater(Runnable)
